action.action-desc: Mr. Carson of Indiana introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to reauthorize the predisaster hazard mitigation program.

section.text: Section 203(m) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5133(m)) is amended to read as follows:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section $200,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2017 through 2022.
